FAQ.Title: Frequently asked questions
FAQ.Bookings.Q1: How to book a parking space?
FAQ.Bookings.Q1.p1: Pour réserver une place de parc avec Pealot, il vous suffit de sélectionner la place de parc qui vous convient sur la page
FAQ.Bookings.Q1.p2: Lorsque vous êtes sur la page de la place de parc que vous souhaitez réserver, vous pouvez sélectionner la période de location durant laquelle vous souhaitez réserver cette place.
FAQ.Bookings.Q1.p3: Vous devrez ensuite sélectionner les jours durant lesquels vous souhaitez louer cette place (les jours non affichés ne sont pas disponibles à la location). Le tarif de votre location variera en fonction des jours sélectionnés.
FAQ.Bookings.Q1.p4: Une fois les jours de location sélectionnés, il vous suffira de renseigner la plaque d'immatriculation du véhicule qui stationnera sur la place puis de cliquer sur “Réserver”.
FAQ.Bookings.Q1.p5: En cliquant sur “Réserver”, vous serez redirigé vers votre panier afin de vérifier les détails de réservation. Une fois que vous vous êtes assuré que les détails de votre réservation sont corrects, cliquer sur “Payer” afin de régler et ainsi confirmer votre réservation. Après le paiement, vous recevrez un email de confirmation vous notifiant que votre réservation a bien été validée.
FAQ.Bookings.Q2: Combien de temps à l'avance puis-je réserver une place de parc ?
FAQ.Bookings.Q2.p1: Les délais de réservation dépendent de la personne ou de l'organisme qui met la place de parc à votre disposition.
FAQ.Bookings.Q2.p2: En général, il est possible de réserver une place jusqu'à soixante jours avant le début de location. Ce délai peut varier en fonction de la place de parc que vous souhaitez louer.
FAQ.Bookings.Q3.p1: Oui, vous pouvez modifier votre réservation si vous le souhaitez. Il vous suffit de nous envoyer un email à contact@pealot.ch en nous indiquant la référence de votre réservation ainsi que les informations concernant les modifications que vous souhaitez apporter (période de réservation, jours de réservation, numéro d'immatriculation).
FAQ.Bookings.Q3.p2: Les modifications peuvent être effectuées si la réservation que vous souhaitez modifier doit débuter dans plus de 7 jours. Si vous souhaitez modifier une réservation en cours (c'est à dire pour une place dont la période de réservation a déjà débuté), les modifications peuvent être effectuées seulement pour le mois suivant, si celui-ci débute dans plus de 7 jours. Toute modification sollicitée moins de 7 jours avant la période de réservation ou avant le mois suivant pourront être effectuées sous conditions en fonction du type de modifications et de la place réservée.
FAQ.Bookings.Q4.p1: Oui, vous pouvez annuler votre réservation si vous le souhaitez. Il vous suffit de nous envoyer un email à contact@pealot.ch en nous indiquant la référence de votre réservation ainsi que les détails concernant votre annulation (délai, motif etc.).
FAQ.Bookings.Q4.p2: Si la période de réservation de la place de parc en question doit débuter dans plus de 7 jours, vous recevrez un remboursement complet. En revanche, si votre période de réservation doit débuter dans 7 jours ou moins, les conditions suivantes s'appliquent en accord avec notre
FAQ.Bookings.Q4.p3: - annulation effectuée moins de 24h avant le début de la période de réservation : pas de remboursement
FAQ.Bookings.Q4.p4: - annulation effectuée entre 1 et 3 jours avant le début de la période de réservation : seule la moitié des frais de location est remboursée, l'autre moitié ainsi que les frais de service ne sont pas remboursés
FAQ.Bookings.Q4.p5: - annulation effectuée entre 3 et 7 jours avant le début de la période de réservation : les frais de location sont remboursés, les frais de service ne sont pas remboursés
FAQ.Bookings.Q5: La place que j'ai réservée nécessite un badge, une clé ou un code. Comment faire pour y accéder ?
FAQ.Bookings.Q5.p1: Lorsque vous réservez une place de parc sécurisée par un code, un badge ou une clé, la personne mettant à votre disposition la place s'engage à vous fournir le code, le badge ou la clé pour y accéder.
FAQ.Bookings.Q5.p2: Avant que votre période de réservation ne débute, vous recevrez un email avec le code d'accès ou les informations vous indiquant comment récupérer le badge ou la clé.
FAQ.Bookings.Q6: Comment contacter la personne qui me loue la place ?
FAQ.Bookings.Q6.p1: Avant que votre période de réservation ne débute, vous recevrez un email avec un lien vous permettant de contacter la personne qui met sa place à votre disposition.
FAQ.Bookings.Q6.p2a: Vous pourrez également accéder à toute les discussions associées à vos réservations ou locations depuis la
FAQ.Bookings.Q6.p2b: sous la section “Hôtes” pour vos réservations et la section “Locataires” pour vos locations.
FAQ.Payment.Q1: Quels moyens de paiement puis-je utiliser ?
FAQ.Payment.Q1.p1: Pour réservez une place et régler vos mensualités, vous pouvez utiliser une carte de crédit de type Visa, MasterCard ou American Express ainsi que Apple Pay.
FAQ.Payment.Q2: J'ai réservé une place pour plusieurs mois, quand devrai-je payer les mois suivants ?
FAQ.Payment.Q2.p1: Une fois le paiement de votre première mensualité effectué, votre réservation sera effective. Vous recevrez ensuite un lien avant chaque fin de mois vous permettant d'effectuer le paiement pour le mois à venir.
FAQ.Payment.Q2.p2: Attention, tout paiement non régularisé avant le dernier jour du mois en cours entraînera la suspension de votre réservation pour les mois suivants et vous n'aurez donc plus accès à la place de parc réservée initialement.
FAQ.Payment.Q3: J'ai reçu un code promo, comment puis-je l'utiliser ?
FAQ.Payment.Q3.p1: Pour utiliser un code promo, il vous suffit de le renseigner au moment du paiement et de valider. Votre réduction sera prise en compte immédiatement et le total de votre commande sera automatiquement mis à jour.
FAQ.Payment.Q4: Pourquoi ai-je seulement reçu un remboursement partiel ?
FAQ.Payment.Q4.p1: Les remboursements partiels entrent en compte pour toute annulation effectuée 7 jours ou moins avant le début de la période de réservation. Vous trouverez plus de détails concernant nos conditions de remboursement en consultant notre
FAQ.Payment.Q4.p2: Pour toute annulation effectuée plus de 7 jours avant le début de la période de réservation, un remboursement complet doit vous être versé. Si vous avez annulé votre réservation plus de 7 jours avant le début de la période de réservation et avez seulement reçu un remboursement partiel, veuillez nous contacter à contact@pealot.ch en nous transmettant les informations liées à votre annulation (numéro de commande, date d'annulation).
FAQ.MyParking.Q1: Puis-je modifier les détails de ma place ?
FAQ.MyParking.Q1.p1: Oui, vous pouvez modifier les détails concernant votre place de parc à tout moment via la page
FAQ.MyParking.Q2: Je souhaite louer ou sous-louer ma place de parc, comment faire ?
FAQ.MyParking.Q2.p1a: Pour louer ou sous-louer votre place de parc, il vous suffit de cliquer sur
FAQ.MyParking.Q2.p1b: et de rensiegner les informations concernant la place de parc que vous souhaitez louer.
FAQ.MyParking.Q3: La sous-location de places de parc est-elle autorisée en Suisse ?
FAQ.MyParking.Q3.p1: Oui, la sous-location est autorisée en Suisse. Veillez tout d'abord à bien vérifier les termes de votre contrat de bail et à soumettre votre intention de sous-location, contenant les conditions de sous-location, au bailleur afin d'obtenir son consentement écrit.
FAQ.MyParking.Q3.p2: Le bailleur ne peut vous refuser la sous-location du bien seulement si vous refusez de lui communiquer les conditions de sous-location, si celles-ci sont abusives ou si la sous-location présente des incovénients majeurs pour le bailleur (art. 262 CO).
FAQ.MyParking.Q4: Ma place de parc nécessite un code, une clé ou un badge. Comment puis-je procéder ?
FAQ.MyParking.Q4.p1: Si vous souhaitez louer ou sous-louer une place de parc sécurisée par un code, une clé ou un badge, lors de la publication de votre place, il vous suffit de renseigner le code ou les informations indiquant à l'utilisateur de votre place comment récupérer le badge ou la clé.
FAQ.MyParking.Q4.p2: Ces informations ne seront transmises aux utilisateurs qu'une fois le paiement effectué pour la réservation de votre place de parc.
FAQ.MyParking.Q5: Puis-je définir des horaires de disponibilté différents en fonction des jours de la semaine ?
FAQ.MyParking.Q5.p1a: Oui. Pour définir des horaires de disponibilté différents en fonction des jours de la semaine, il vous suffit de répondre “Oui” à la question “Horaires de disponibilité différents pour d'autres jours ?” lorsque vous
FAQ.MyParking.Q5.p1b: , afin de définir d'autres jours et horaires de disponibilité.
FAQ.MyAccount.Q1: Comment consulter les détails d'une réservation en cours ?
FAQ.MyAccount.Q1.p1: Pour consulter les détails d'une réservation en cours, il vous suffit de vous connecter à votre compte et de cliquer sur le bouton Mes réservations en haut de la page
FAQ.MyAccount.Q2: Puis-je consulter les détails d'une réservation passée ?
FAQ.MyAccount.Q2.p1a: Vous pouvez consulter les détails de vos réservations passées en vous connectant à
FAQ.MyAccount.Q2.p1b: . Vos commandes passées s'afficheront sous Historique des réservations.
FAQ.MyAccount.Q3: Comment recevoir les liens de paiement sur une autre adresse email ?
FAQ.MyAccount.Q3.p1: Vous pouvez  modifier l'adresse email sur laquelle vous sont envoyés les liens de paiement via votre compte. Une fois connecté(e) à votre compte, il vous suffit de cliquer sur Mes réservations puis de cliquer sur la réservation pour laquelle vous souhaitez modifier votre adresse email. Sous Contact, vous pourrez modifier l'adresse email enregistrée pour cette réservation.
FAQ.MyAccount.Q4: J'ai oublié mon mot de passe, que dois-je faire ?
FAQ.MyAccount.Q4.p1: Si vous avez un compte mais ne vous souvenez plus de votre mot de passe, vous pouvez le réinitialiser en cliquant sur Mot de passe oublié sur la

PrivacyPolicyPage.heading: Pealot Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicyPage.Intro: This Privacy Policy describes how your personal information is collected, used and shared when you visit, use or transact from pealot.com (the/this/our “site”, “website”).
PrivacyPolicyPage.A1.title: SECTION 1 - PERSONAL INFORMATION WE COLLECT
PrivacyPolicyPage.A1.p1: When you make a purchase on our site, as part of our buying and selling process, we collect the personal information you provide to us, such as your name, address and email address.
PrivacyPolicyPage.A1.p2: When you browse our store, we also automatically receive the Internet Protocol (IP) address of your computer, which allows us to obtain more details about the browser and operating system you are using.
PrivacyPolicyPage.A1.p3: E-mail Marketing: With your permission, we may send you e-mails about our store, new products and services, and other updates.
PrivacyPolicyPage.A2.title: SECTION 2 - CONSENT
PrivacyPolicyPage.A2.p1: How do you obtain my consent?
PrivacyPolicyPage.A2.p2: When you provide us with your personal information to complete a transaction, verify your credit card, place an order or request a refund, we assume that you consent to our collection and use of your information for that purpose only.
PrivacyPolicyPage.A2.p3: If we ask you to provide your personal information for any other reason, such as marketing purposes, we will ask you directly for your express consent, or we will give you the opportunity to decline.
PrivacyPolicyPage.A2.p4: How do I withdraw my consent?
PrivacyPolicyPage.A2.p5: If, after you have given us your consent, you change your mind and no longer consent to our contacting you, collecting your information or disclosing it, you may notify us by contacting us at contact@pealot.com.
PrivacyPolicyPage.A3.title: SECTION 3 - DISCLOSURE
PrivacyPolicyPage.A3.p1: We may disclose your personal information if we are required to do so by law or if you violate our Terms of Service.
PrivacyPolicyPage.A4.title: SECTION 4 - PAYMENT
PrivacyPolicyPage.A4.p1: If you make your purchase through a direct payment gateway, in that case this direct payment gateway will store your credit card information. This information is encrypted in accordance with the Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI-DSS). Your purchase transaction information is retained for as long as necessary to complete your order. Once your order is finalized, your purchase transaction information is deleted.
PrivacyPolicyPage.A4.p2: All direct payment gateways are PCI-DSS compliant, managed by the PCI Security Standards Council, which is a joint effort of companies such as Visa, MasterCard, American Express and Discover.
PrivacyPolicyPage.A4.p3: PCI-DSS requirements ensure the secure processing of credit card data by our store and its service providers.
PrivacyPolicyPage.A4.p4: For more information, please see the direct payment gateway Terms of Service or Privacy Policy.
PrivacyPolicyPage.A5.title: SECTION 5 - SERVICES PROVIDED BY THIRD PARTIES
PrivacyPolicyPage.A5.p1: Generally, the third party providers we use will only collect, use and disclose your information to the extent necessary to perform the services they provide to us.
PrivacyPolicyPage.A5.p2: However, some third party service providers, such as payment gateways and other payment transaction processors, have their own privacy policies regarding the information we are required to provide to them for your purchase transactions.
PrivacyPolicyPage.A5.p3: With respect to these providers, we recommend that you read their privacy policies carefully so that you can understand how they will handle your personal information.
PrivacyPolicyPage.A5.p4: Keep in mind that some providers may be located or have facilities located in a different jurisdiction than you or us. So if you decide to proceed with a transaction that requires the services of a third party supplier, then your information may be governed by the laws of the jurisdiction in which that supplier is located or the jurisdiction in which its facilities are located.
PrivacyPolicyPage.A5.p5: For example, if you are located in Switzerland and your transaction is processed through a payment gateway located in the United States, your information that was used to complete the transaction could be disclosed under U.S. law, including the Patriot Act.
PrivacyPolicyPage.A5.p6: Once you leave our site or are redirected to a third party website or application, you are no longer governed by this Privacy Policy or our website's Terms of Service and Use.
PrivacyPolicyPage.A5.p8: You may be required to leave our website by clicking on certain links on our website. We assume no responsibility for the privacy practices employed by these other sites and recommend that you read their privacy policies carefully.
PrivacyPolicyPage.A6.title: ARTICLE 6 - SECURITY
PrivacyPolicyPage.A6.p1: To protect your personal data, we take reasonable precautions and follow industry best practices to ensure that it is not lost, misappropriated, accessed, disclosed, altered or destroyed inappropriately.
PrivacyPolicyPage.A6.p2: If you provide us with your credit card information, it will be encrypted through the use of SSL security protocol and stored with AES-256 encryption. While no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, we follow all PCI-DSS requirements and implement additional generally accepted industry standards.
PrivacyPolicyPage.A7.title: ARTICLE 7 - CONSENT AGE
PrivacyPolicyPage.A7.p1: By using this site, you affirm that you are at least the age of majority in your state or province of residence, and that you have given us your consent to allow any minor that may depend on you to use this website.
PrivacyPolicyPage.A8.title: ARTICLE 8 - CHANGES TO THIS PRIVACY POLICY
PrivacyPolicyPage.A8.p1: We reserve the right to change this privacy policy at any time, so please check back frequently. Changes and clarifications will take effect immediately upon posting on the website. If we make any changes to the content of this policy, we will notify you here that it has been updated, so that you will know what information we collect, how we use it, and under what circumstances, if any, we disclose it.
PrivacyPolicyPage.A8.p2: If our store is acquired by or merged with another company, your information may be transferred to the new owners so that we can continue to sell you products and services.
PrivacyPolicyPage.Outro.title: QUESTIONS AND CONTACT INFORMATION
PrivacyPolicyPage.Outro.p1: If you would like to access, correct, amend or delete any personal information we have about you, file a complaint, or if you would simply like more information, contact our Privacy Standards Officer at contact@pealot.com.

ReimbursmentPage.heading: Reimbursment
ReimbursmentPage.p1: Our policy lasts 14 days. If 14 days have gone by since your booking, unfortunately we can’t offer you a refund.
ReimbursmentPage.p2: For any product or service reservation where rental is to begin 7 days or less after payment of the reservation, refunds will only be allowed in full within 24 hours after payment has been made.
ReimbursmentPage.p3: To be eligible for a refund, your product or service must be unused and the rental period of your product or service must not have begun.
ReimbursmentPage.p4: Many types of products cannot be refunded. Gift cards, promotional codes, vouchers and downloadable software are not eligible for refunds. Refunds are also excluded as a result of unauthorized, illegal, non-conforming or abusive use of the Service including, but not limited to, any use that violates the laws and rules provided for in the municipality, township (or region) and state or any geographic area or jurisdiction in which you are located and those in which the Service is provided or used. Any product or service that has been used or partially used will also not be eligible for a refund.
ReimbursmentPage.p5: To be eligible for a refund, you must provide us with a receipt or a proof of purchase.
ReimbursmentPage.p6: There are certain situations where only a partial refund could be issued:
ReimbursmentPage.p7: Any product or service for which the rental period must begin in 7 days or less:
ReimbursmentPage.p7a: less than 24 hours before the start of the rental period: no refund
ReimbursmentPage.p7b: between 1 and 3 days before the start of the rental period: only half of the rental fee is refunded, the other half as well as the service fee is not refunded
ReimbursmentPage.p7c: between 3 and 7 days before the start of the reservation period: the rental fee is refunded, the service fee is not refunded
ReimbursmentPage.p8: Once we receive and review your refund request, we will send you an email to confirm that we have received it. We will also inform you of our decision on whether to approve or reject your refund request. If your request is approved, then your refund will be processed, and a credit will automatically be applied to your credit card or original payment method, within a certain number of days.
ReimbursmentPage.p9a: If you have not yet received your refund, please first check your bank account again. Next, contact your credit card entity as there may be a delay before your refund is officially posted. Next, contact your bank. There is often a processing time required before a refund is posted.
ReimbursmentPage.p9b: If after completing all of these steps, you still have not received your refund, please contact us at contact@pealot.com.
ReimbursmentPage.p10a: Only normally priced items can be refunded. Unfortunately, items on sale or with discounts are not refundable.

SectionHero.subTitle: Enjoy a unique parking experience in Switzerland
SectionHero.title: Book private parking spaces everywhere
SectionHowItWorks.createListingLink: PS. You can also become a Pealot host in just a few clicks!
SectionHowItWorks.part1Text: Start by searching for a location. Once you find a parking space you like, simply check the availability, book it, and make a secure payment right away.
SectionHowItWorks.part2Text: Start parking on the chosen date and enjoy a private parking experience. We'll handle the payment to the host after your experience.
SectionHowItWorks.part3Text: If you enjoyed the experience, let others know by reviewing your parking host. Help others know where to park.
SectionLocations.title: Find the perfect parking space

TermsOfServicePage.heading: Terms of Service
TermsOfServicePage.Intro.title: OVERVIEW
TermsOfServicePage.Intro.p1: This website is operated by Pealot SA. Throughout the website, the terms “we”, “us” and “our” refer to Pealot SA. We offer this website, including all information, tools and services available from this website to you, the user, conditioned upon your acceptance of all terms, conditions, policies and notices stated here.
TermsOfServicePage.Intro.p2: By visiting our website and/ or purchasing one of our products and services, you engage in our “Service” and agree to be bound by the following terms and conditions (“Terms of Service”, “Terms”), including those additional terms and conditions and policies referenced herein and/or available by hyperlink. These Terms of Service apply to all users of the website, including without limitation users who are browsing our website, vendors, customers, merchants, and/or contributors of content.
TermsOfServicePage.Intro.p3: Please read these Terms of Service carefully before accessing or using our website. By accessing or using any part of the website, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to all the terms and conditions of this agreement, then you may not access the website or use any services. If these Terms of Service are considered an offer, acceptance is expressly limited to these Terms of Service.
TermsOfServicePage.Intro.p4: Any new features or tools which are added to the current website shall also be subject to the Terms of Service. You can review the most current version of the Terms of Service at any time on this page. We reserve the right to update, change or replace any part of these Terms of Service by posting updates and/or changes to our website. It is your responsibility to check this page periodically for changes. Your continued use of or access to the website following the posting of any changes constitutes acceptance of those changes.
TermsOfServicePage.A1.title: SECTION 1 - ONLINE PLATFORM TERMS
TermsOfServicePage.A1.p1: By agreeing to these Terms of Service, you affirm that you are the age of majority in your state or province of residence and you have given us your consent to allow any minor that may depend on you to use this website.
TermsOfServicePage.A1.p2: You may not use our products for any illegal or unauthorized purpose nor may you, in the use of the Service, violate any laws in your jurisdiction (including but not limited to copyright laws).
TermsOfServicePage.A1.p3: You must not transmit any worms or viruses or any code of a destructive nature.
TermsOfServicePage.A1.p4: A breach or violation of any of the Terms will result in an immediate termination of your Services.
TermsOfServicePage.A2.title: SECTION 2 - GENERAL CONDITIONS
TermsOfServicePage.A2.p1: We reserve the right to refuse service to anyone for any reason at any time.
TermsOfServicePage.A2.p2: You understand that your content (not including credit card information), may be transferred unencrypted and involve (a) transmissions over various networks; and (b) changes to conform and adapt to technical requirements of connecting networks or devices. Credit card information is always encrypted during transfer over networks.
TermsOfServicePage.A2.p3: You agree not to reproduce, duplicate, copy, sell, resell or exploit any portion of the Service, use of the Service, or access to the Service or any contact on the website through which the service is provided, without express written permission by us.
TermsOfServicePage.A2.p4: The headings used in this agreement are included for convenience only and will not limit or otherwise affect these Terms.
TermsOfServicePage.A3.title: SECTION 3 - ACCURACY, COMPLETENESS AND TIMELINESS OF INFORMATION
TermsOfServicePage.A3.p1: We are not responsible if information made available on this website is not accurate, complete or current. The material on this website is provided for general information only and should not be relied upon or used as the sole basis for making decisions without consulting primary, more accurate, more complete or more timely sources of information. Any reliance on the material on this website is at your own risk.
TermsOfServicePage.A3.p2: This website may contain certain historical information. Historical information, necessarily, is not current and is provided for your reference only. We reserve the right to modify the contents of this website at any time, but we have no obligation to update any information on our website. You agree that it is your responsibility to monitor changes to our website.
TermsOfServicePage.A4.title: SECTION 4 - MODIFICATIONS TO THE SERVICE AND PRICES
TermsOfServicePage.A4.p1: Prices for our products and services are subject to change without notice.
TermsOfServicePage.A4.p2: We reserve the right at any time to modify or discontinue the Service (or any part or content thereof) without notice at any time.
TermsOfServicePage.A4.p3: We shall not be liable to you or to any third-party for any modification, price change, suspension or discontinuance of the Service.
TermsOfServicePage.A5.title: SECTION 5 - PRODUCTS OR SERVICES
TermsOfServicePage.A5.p1: Some products or services may be available exclusively online through the website. These products or services may have limited quantities and are subject to refund only according to our Reimbursment policy.
TermsOfServicePage.A5.p2: We have made every effort to display as accurately as possible the colors and images of our products that appear at the store. We cannot guarantee that your computer monitor's display of any color will be accurate.
TermsOfServicePage.A5.p3: When you book a service, including the use of one or more parking spaces for a specific or indefinite period of time, you agree to pay all fees associated with the use of that service, including monthly payments, in order to keep your reservation active for the period of time originally booked. You must pay the monthly service usage fee prior to each month for which the service has been reserved. If payment is not made prior to the beginning of a month for which the service has been reserved, your reservation will become null and void, making your use of the originally booked service unauthorized.
TermsOfServicePage.A5.p4: We reserve the right, but are not obligated, to limit the sales of our products or Services to any person, geographic region or jurisdiction. We may exercise this right on a case-by-case basis. We reserve the right to limit the quantities of any products or services that we offer. All descriptions of products/services or product/service pricing are subject to change at anytime without notice, at the sole discretion of us. We reserve the right to discontinue any product or service at any time. Any offer for any product or service made on this website is void where prohibited.
TermsOfServicePage.A5.p5: We do not warrant that the quality of any products, services, information, or other material purchased or obtained by you will meet your expectations, or that any errors in the Service will be corrected.
TermsOfServicePage.A6.title: SECTION 6 - ACCURACY OF BILLING AND ACCOUNT INFORMATION
TermsOfServicePage.A6.p1: We reserve the right to refuse any order you place with us. We may, in our sole discretion, limit or cancel quantities purchased per person, per household or per order. These restrictions may include orders placed by or under the same customer account, the same credit card, and/or orders that use the same billing and/or shipping address. In the event that we make a change to or cancel an order, we may attempt to notify you by contacting the e-mail and/or billing address/phone number provided at the time the order was made. We reserve the right to limit or prohibit orders that, in our sole judgment, appear to be placed by dealers, resellers or distributors.
TermsOfServicePage.A6.p2: You agree to provide current, complete and accurate purchase and account information for all purchases made at our store. You agree to promptly update your account and other information, including your email address and credit card numbers and expiration dates, so that we can complete your transactions and contact you as needed.
TermsOfServicePage.A6.p3: For more detail, please review our Reimbursment policy.
TermsOfServicePage.A7.title: SECTION 7 - OPTIONAL TOOLS
TermsOfServicePage.A7.p1: We may provide you with access to third-party tools over which we neither monitor nor have any control nor input.
TermsOfServicePage.A7.p2: You acknowledge and agree that we provide access to such tools ”as is” and “as available” without any warranties, representations or conditions of any kind and without any endorsement. We shall have no liability whatsoever arising from or relating to your use of optional third-party tools.
TermsOfServicePage.A7.p3: Any use by you of optional tools offered through the website is entirely at your own risk and discretion and you should ensure that you are familiar with and approve of the terms on which tools are provided by the relevant third-party provider(s).
TermsOfServicePage.A7.p4: We may also, in the future, offer new services and/or features through the website (including, the release of new tools and resources). Such new features and/or services shall also be subject to these Terms of Service.
TermsOfServicePage.A8.title: SECTION 8 - THIRD-PARTY LINKS
TermsOfServicePage.A8.p1: Some content, products and services available via our Service may include materials from third-parties.
TermsOfServicePage.A8.p2: Third-party links on this site may direct you to third-party websites that are not affiliated with us. We are not responsible for examining or evaluating the content or accuracy and we do not warrant and will not have any liability or responsibility for any third-party materials or websites, or for any other materials, products, or services of third-parties.
TermsOfServicePage.A8.p3: We are not liable for any harm or damages related to the purchase or use of goods, services, resources, content, or any other transactions made in connection with any third-party websites. Please review carefully the third-party's policies and practices and make sure you understand them before you engage in any transaction. Complaints, claims, concerns, or questions regarding third-party products and services should be directed to the third-party.
TermsOfServicePage.A9.title: SECTION 9 - USER COMMENTS, FEEDBACK AND OTHER SUBMISSIONS
TermsOfServicePage.A9.p1: If, at our request, you send certain specific submissions (for example contest entries) or without a request from us you send creative ideas, suggestions, proposals, plans, or other materials, whether online, by email, by postal mail, or otherwise (collectively, “comments”), you agree that we may, at any time, without restriction, edit, copy, publish, distribute, translate and otherwise use in any medium any comments that you forward to us. We are and shall be under no obligation (1) to maintain any comments in confidence; (2) to pay compensation for any comments; or (3) to respond to any comments.
TermsOfServicePage.A9.p2: We may, but have no obligation to, monitor, edit or remove content that we determine in our sole discretion are unlawful, offensive, threatening, libelous, defamatory, pornographic, obscene or otherwise objectionable or violates any party’s intellectual property or these Terms of Service.
TermsOfServicePage.A9.p3: You agree that your comments will not violate any right of any third-party, including copyright, trademark, privacy, personality or other personal or proprietary right. You further agree that your comments will not contain libelous or otherwise unlawful, abusive or obscene material, or contain any computer virus or other malware that could in any way affect the operation of the Service or any related website. You may not use a false e-mail address, pretend to be someone other than yourself, or otherwise mislead us or third-parties as to the origin of any comments. You are solely responsible for any comments you make and their accuracy. We take no responsibility and assume no liability for any comments posted by you or any third-party.
TermsOfServicePage.A10.title: SECTION 10 - PERSONAL INFORMATION
TermsOfServicePage.A10.p1: Your submission of personal information through the store is governed by our
TermsOfServicePage.A11.title: SECTION 11 - ERRORS, INACCURACIES AND OMISSIONS
TermsOfServicePage.A11.p1: Occasionally there may be information on our website or in the Service that contains typographical errors, inaccuracies or omissions that may relate to product/service descriptions, pricing, promotions, offers, product shipping charges, transit times and availability. We reserve the right to correct any errors, inaccuracies or omissions, and to change or update information or cancel orders if any information in the Service or on any related website is inaccurate at any time without prior notice (including after you have submitted your order).
TermsOfServicePage.A11.p2: We undertake no obligation to update, amend or clarify information in the Service or on any related website, including without limitation, pricing information, except as required by law. No specified update or refresh date applied in the Service or on any related website, should be taken to indicate that all information in the Service or on any related website has been modified or updated..
TermsOfServicePage.A12.title: SECTION 12 - PROHIBITED USES
TermsOfServicePage.A12.p1: In addition to other prohibitions as set forth in the Terms of Service, you are prohibited from using the site or its content: (a) for any unlawful purpose; (b) to solicit others to perform or participate in any unlawful acts; (c) to violate any international, federal, cantonal, communal, provincial or state regulations, rules, laws, or local ordinances; (d) to infringe upon or violate our intellectual property rights or the intellectual property rights of others; (e) to harass, abuse, insult, harm, defame, slander, disparage, intimidate, or discriminate based on gender, sexual orientation, religion, ethnicity, race, age, national origin, or disability; (f) to submit false or misleading information;(g) to upload or transmit viruses or any other type of malicious code that will or may be used in any way that will affect the functionality or operation of the Service or of any related website, other websites, or the Internet; (h) to collect or track the personal information of others; (i) to spam, phish, pharm, pretext, spider, crawl, or scrape; (j) for any obscene or immoral purpose; or (k) to interfere with or circumvent the security features of the Service or any related website, other websites, or the Internet. We reserve the right to terminate your use of the Service or any related website for violating any of the prohibited uses.
TermsOfServicePage.A13.title: SECTION 13 - DISCLAIMER OF WARRANTIES; LIMITATION OF LIABILITY
TermsOfServicePage.A13.p1: We do not guarantee, represent or warrant that your use of our service will be uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free.
TermsOfServicePage.A13.p2: We do not warrant that the results that may be obtained from the use of the service will be accurate or reliable.
TermsOfServicePage.A13.p3: You agree that from time to time we may remove the Service for indefinite periods of time or cancel the service at any time, without notice to you.
TermsOfServicePage.A13.p4: You expressly agree that your use of, or inability to use, the service is at your sole risk. You also expressly agree that your use of the Service is legally authorized and that such use does not violate any law or regulation (including, without limitation, any municipal, cantonal or federal law) in Switzerland or any other law in the country, state or any geographic area or jurisdiction in which you are located and in which the Service is provided or used. You must keep yourself informed of the legal provisions applicable in the commune/municipality, canton (or region) and state or any geographic region or jurisdiction in which you are located and in which the Service is provided or used, including, but not limited to, authorizations, taxes, taxes and other compensation related to the use of real estate properties use by others that you are required to pay, rules and laws governing the use, rental and subletting of real estate properties, and expressly agree that you are responsible for any use of the Service, whether authorized, unauthorized, legal or illegal. The Service and all products and services delivered to you through the Service are (except as expressly stated by us) provided 'as is' and 'as available' for your use, without any representation, warranties or conditions of any kind, either express or implied, including all implied warranties or conditions of merchantability, merchantable quality, fitness for a particular purpose, durability, title, and non-infringement.
TermsOfServicePage.A13.p5: In no case shall Pealot SA, their directors, officers, employees, affiliates, agents, contractors, interns, suppliers, service providers or licensors be liable for any injury, loss, claim, or any direct, indirect, incidental, punitive, special, or consequential damages of any kind, including, without limitation lost profits, lost revenue, lost savings, loss of data, replacement costs, or any similar damages, whether based in contract, tort (including negligence), strict liability or otherwise, arising from your use of any of the service or any products procured using the service, or for any other claim related in any way to your use of the service or any product, including, but not limited to, any errors or omissions in any content, or any loss or damage of any kind incurred as a result of the use of the service or any content (or product) posted, transmitted, or otherwise made available via the service, even if advised of their possibility. Because some states or jurisdictions do not allow the exclusion or the limitation of liability for consequential or incidental damages, in such states or jurisdictions, our liability shall be limited to the maximum extent permitted by law.
TermsOfServicePage.A14.title: SECTION 14 - INDEMNIFICATION
TermsOfServicePage.A14.p1: You agree to indemnify, defend and hold harmless Pealot SA and our parent, subsidiaries, affiliates, partners, officers, directors, agents, contractors, licensors, service providers, subcontractors, suppliers, interns and employees, harmless from any claim or demand, including reasonable attorneys’ fees, made by any third-party due to or arising out of your breach of these Terms of Service or the documents they incorporate by reference, or your violation of any law or the rights of a third-party.
TermsOfServicePage.A15.title: SECTION 15 - SEVERABILITY
TermsOfServicePage.A15.p1: In the event that any provision of these Terms of Service is determined to be unlawful, void or unenforceable, such provision shall nonetheless be enforceable to the fullest extent permitted by applicable law, and the unenforceable portion shall be deemed to be severed from these Terms of Service, such determination shall not affect the validity and enforceability of any other remaining provisions.
TermsOfServicePage.A16.title: SECTION 16 - TERMINATION
TermsOfServicePage.A16.p1: The obligations and liabilities of the parties incurred prior to the termination date shall survive the termination of this agreement for all purposes.
TermsOfServicePage.A16.p2: These Terms of Service are effective unless and until terminated by either you or us. You may terminate these Terms of Service at any time by notifying us that you no longer wish to use our Services, or when you cease using our website.
TermsOfServicePage.A16.p3: If in our sole judgment you fail, or we suspect that you have failed, to comply with any term or provision of these Terms of Service, we also may terminate this agreement at any time without notice and you will remain liable for all amounts due up to and including the date of termination; and/or accordingly may deny you access to our Services (or any part thereof).
TermsOfServicePage.A17.title: SECTION 17 - ENTIRE AGREEMENT
TermsOfServicePage.A17.p1: The failure of us to exercise or enforce any right or provision of these Terms of Service shall not constitute a waiver of such right or provision.
TermsOfServicePage.A17.p2: These Terms of Service and any policies or operating rules posted by us on this website or in respect to The Service constitutes the entire agreement and understanding between you and us and govern your use of the Service, superseding any prior or contemporaneous agreements, communications and proposals, whether oral or written, between you and us (including, but not limited to, any prior versions of the Terms of Service).

TermsOfServicePage.A18.title: SECTION 18 - GOVERNING LAW
TermsOfServicePage.A18.p1: These Terms of Service and any separate agreements whereby we provide you Services shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws in force in Lausanne, Switzerland.
